sentences.sContent: The house was full of worthless junk.
sentences.sCn: 这房子里堆满了没有用的东西。

sentences.sContent: The information was worthless to me.
sentences.sCn: 这些资料对我毫无用处。

synos.tran: 无价值的；不值钱的；卑微的

words.tran: 值得的；有价值的；配得上的，相称的；可尊敬的；应…的

trans.tranOther: something that is worthless has no value, importance, or use
